special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Grisha is a 6th-level-spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, divine favor, inflict wounds, protection from good, shield of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, divine favor, inflict wounds, protection from good, shield of faith

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): continual flame, hold person, magic weapon, spiritual weapon
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): continual flame, hold person, magic weapon, spiritual weapon

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, dispel magic, spirit guardian
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, dispel magic, spirit guardian

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Grisha makes two attacks with his +1 flail.

actions.name: +1 Flail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage
